markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 6"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Daring Act](/Feats.aspx?ID=1069) <actions string="Two Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Character Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=12) pg. 74 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Archetype** [Firebrand Braggart](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=24)

**Prerequisites**
Trained in [Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) or Trained in [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3); [Firebrand Braggart Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=1067)

</column>

---

You attempt a death-defying maneuver to distract your enemies. Select one foe within reach and attempt either an Acrobatics or Athletics check against your target’s Reflex DC. If you succeed, you can Stride up to half your Speed (or up to your full Speed if you critically succeed) without triggering reactions from the target due to your movement, and the target is [flat-footed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=16) against the next melee attack you attempt against it before the end of your turn.

<title level="2">Daring Act leads to...</title>
[Daredevil's Gambit](/Feats.aspx?ID=1074), [Daring Flourish](/Feats.aspx?ID=1072)
name: Daring Act
prerequisite: Trained in Acrobatics or Trained in Athletics; Firebrand Braggart Dedication
prerequisite_markdown: Trained in [Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) or Trained in [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3); [Firebrand Braggart Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=1067)

</summary>
